{{Quote|Luke, to the Stewards.|[[Lord Commander of the Night's Watch|Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]]|You Win or You Die}}'''Luke'''Â is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made [[Steward (Night's Watch)|Steward]] of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Luke is present during the speech [[Lord Commander of the Night's Watch|Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. He is assigned to the Stewards.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
